item.title: FTNT
item.description: score:229 Chances: Fortinet Inc. continues to lead the industry in cybersecurity solutions, with a strong focus on network security, cloud security, and endpoint protection. The company’s release of new, integrated operational technology (OT) security solutions and services further solidifies its position as an industry leader.
